name: MXGP2 - The Official Motocross Videogame Compact
name_original: MXGP2 - The Official Motocross Videogame Compact
description: MXGP2 - The Official Motocross Videogame Compact will let you relive the Motocross World Championship, allowing you to choose all the riders, official teams and tracks from the 2015  MXGP-class season!
